description: Billy is one of those incredibly fit young men who has a real cocky attitude. He's a gorgeous guy, no doubt about that, but of course master Sebastian doesn't like his slaves having thoughts beyond their station. He's being put in his place right from the start, roped up on the scaffold, punched, wanked, sucked, blindfolded and doused in hot molten wax! He's no longer top dog, especially not when the master takes full control and wanks the boy off until his cum is flying from his dick against his will! It's not over of course, a spent cock on a new boy like that needs some more punishment before he can be left to think about what a bitch he's become.
title: Billy Rock & Sebastian Kane
